# import data

The dataset was downloaded from [kaggle.com](https://www.kaggle.com/gregorut/videogamesales). 

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
options(width = 119)
library(readr)
options("readr.num_columns" = 0)
vgsales <- read_csv("vgsales.csv")
```

# data overview


```{r, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
vgsales %>% 
  select(contains("_sales")) %>% 
  summary()
```
